name: Zen Burger
description:
Pile the best possible burger in the most feng-shui way. -- Controls for Keyboard and Xbox Controller
  • Arrow Keys & Left Stick (xbox) : Move Item
  • Space & A (xbox) : Drop Item
  • E & Y (xbox) : Finish Burger
  • R & Start (xbox) : Restart
  • Escape & Back (xbox) : Return to menu / Quit

Made during 24h for the BBQ Game Jam 2017 in Metz (itch.io/jam/bbq-game-jam-2017) organized by COIN (extra-coin.org/en) & TCRM-BLIDA (tcrm-blida.com)

-- Bamboo Team
  • 3D & Graphics : Camille Rosen (@Caramiie) her Portofolio (caramie.com) & Florian Hurtaut (@FlorianHurtaut) from Flying Oak Games (flying-oak.com)
  • Code : Yvan Corsiglia (@Striwx) from Nice Penguins (nicepenguins.fr)
  • Sound Design & Additional Graphics : J.Mad (@insaneJMad)
  • Voice Acting & Inspiration : Thomas Altenburger (@mrhelmut) also from Flying Oak Games (flying-oak.com)
Others
  • Music by samulis : http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/586592
